response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's truly a game-changer and I believe it could significantly benefit your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth more than just $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique opportunities it offers, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $15,000. This investment would not only provide immediate benefits but also ensure long-term growth and efficiency. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.", "product_price": 15000}
